page.title: 19Description of sports centre
page.content: The sports hall at Castlefield School Dorchester is large with much much space. It is 22 paces wide and 41 paces long. You can do many differenent activities there, including Rock climbing,Netball,Basket ball and short tennis.The club that use the centre are swimming,water polo and soccer coaching. In the sports hall they have 4 badminton courts,4 short tennis courts,1 indoor football pitch,2 basketball pitches,2 netball pitches and six climbing walls.On the roof there are 48 lights which cover a large space.The walls are made of white bricks and the floor is green.When the hall is empty it echoes alot.
